snippet.title: The Blind Prophet Trailer - Point'n'click adventure/narrative game
snippet.description:
🎮First trailer for The Blind Prophet, get the demo here : https://gamejolt.com/games/TheBlindProphet/303701🎮
🔥If you loved it, you can help us on our Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1353100600/the-blind-prophet-blood-of-the-apostle?ref=nav_search&result=project&term=the%20blind%20prophet🔥
You can also share the game around you, any help is welcome, thanks! 

https://www.facebook.com/theblindprophetgame/
https://twitter.com/ArsGoetiaGames
We are also on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/arsgoetiagames/ 

See ya ! 

Music credit: Arthur Dos Santos (Cinetiq)
